title: Authors and Citation
text: ANDO K (2023). rtatools: Functions road traffic accident data analysis. R package version 0.0.0.9001.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rtatools: Functions for road traffic accident data analysis},   author = {Keisuke ANDO},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001}, }

what: Functions for road traffic accident data analysis
title: Functions for road traffic accident data analysis
text: rtatools package road traffic accident data analysis. package provides functions analyze accident data Japan, downloading traffic accident data converting coordinates accident points. package also used library rtadb, repository introduces method creating database traffic accident data.

what: Convert form of latitude and longitude from DMS to DEG — convert_deg
title: Convert form of latitude and longitude from DMS to DEG — convert_deg
text: Converts latitude longitude expressed DMS (Degree, Minute, Second) format decimal notation, DEG (Degree) format.

title: Convert form of latitude and longitude from DMS to DEG — convert_deg
Convert form of latitude and longitude from DMS to DEG — convert_deg
Convert form of latitude and longitude from DMS to DEG — convert_deg
Convert form of latitude and longitude from DMS to DEG — convert_deg
Download traffic accident data — download_traffic_accidents_main
text: Download file traffic accident data National Police Agency's Web page (https://www.npa.go.jp/publications/statistics/koutsuu/opendata/index_opendata.html). type traffic accident data include main (honhyo) , sub (hojuhyo), highway (kosokuhyo), code (codebook). downloaded file saved specified directory naming format "traffic-accident-{year}-{type}.{ext}". ext file extension: "pdf" type "code", "csv" types.

title: Download traffic accident data — download_traffic_accidents_main
code: download_traffic_accidents_main(destdir = NULL, year = 2021)  download_traffic_accidents_sub(destdir = NULL, year = 2021)  download_traffic_accidents_highway(destdir = NULL, year = 2021)  download_traffic_accidents_code(destdir = NULL, year = 2021)

title: Download traffic accident data — download_traffic_accidents_main
text: destdir directory downloaded file saved. year Year traffic accident data recorded.

title: Download traffic accident data — download_traffic_accidents_main
code: if (FALSE) { # Download data sets. download_traffic_accidents_main("data") download_traffic_accidents_sub("data") download_traffic_accidents_highway("data") download_traffic_accidents_code("data") }

title: Read traffic accident data — read_traffic_accidents_main
text: Read file traffic accident data specified path. type traffic accident data include main (honhyo) , sub (hojuhyo), highway (kosokuhyo), code (codebook).

title: Read traffic accident data — read_traffic_accidents_main
code: if (FALSE) { # Read traffic accident main data(honhyo) file <- download_traffic_accidents_main("data") data <- read_traffic_accidents_main(file) }
